search_query: Freshworks Freshdesk competitors 2015 customer service helpdesk
context: Freshworks Inc. is a SaaS customer and employee engagement software focused on CRM, IT service management, and customer support software. Expanded to CRM and IT management. Freshsales, Freshservice.

competitors.name: Zendesk
competitors.notes: Market leader in cloud-based customer service software, founded in 2007. Zendesk was the primary competitor with strong enterprise presence, extensive features, and higher pricing that Freshworks positioned against.

competitors.name: Salesforce Service Cloud
competitors.notes: Enterprise customer service platform integrated with Salesforce's CRM ecosystem, targeting larger organizations with complex service requirements.

competitors.name: Zoho Desk (Zoho Support)
competitors.notes: Part of Zoho's suite of business applications, offering helpdesk and customer support functionality with strong integration across Zoho products, competing in the SMB space.

competitors.name: Desk.com
competitors.notes: Small business-focused helpdesk solution (acquired by Salesforce in 2011) that competed in the SMB market segment before being merged into Service Cloud.

competitors.name: UserVoice
competitors.notes: Customer feedback and helpdesk platform popular with SaaS companies, offering ticketing, feedback forums, and knowledge base features.

competitors.name: Help Scout
competitors.notes: Simple, email-based customer support platform targeting small businesses looking for an alternative to complex helpdesk systems.

competitors.name: TeamSupport
competitors.notes: B2B-focused customer support software offering ticket management and collaboration features for support teams.
